message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.MM

The paper discusses the performance analysis of spectrum handoff in cognitive radio ad hoc networks, which involves network coordination, channel selection, and spectrum sensing delay. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) as it deals with the transmission of information over a limited bandwidth. The paper also falls under the category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as it discusses the security issues related to spectrum handoff. The paper also involves system and control theory (cs.SY) as it proposes a novel three-dimensional discrete-time Markov chain to characterize the spectrum handoff process. Finally, the paper also involves multimedia (cs.MM) as it discusses the impact of retransmissions of collided packets on network performance.
